name: Eight-Dungeon
description:
Hi, FartFish here! This game is a pre-demo to a much larger (and better) game I am working on, Infinidungeon! But for the time being, this is all you get - Eight-Dungeon! It was used for a game jam in which there was no theme, and the main constraint was that everything had to be drawn within 8 px by 8 px!

Controls: 

-WASD or Arrow Keys for movement

-Space or Shift to dash

-Left Click to summon lightning (only works on some levels!)
